betterquesting:10.desc:8:
With a crafting table you can now make pickaxes and hammers.

Up to this points tools could me made on the go, but a pickaxe will require three adjacents crafting slots, even if these tools still require a single stick.

A reminder: a flint pickaxe works nicely enough, but when you'll start digging for ores you'll find harder rock layers that cannot be broken with a flint pickaxe, and often it will mean you won't have a direct path to the ore. To be sure, you should try to get a red or black granite pickaxe.

Red or black granite is fairly common. Your first goal is roam around to start looking for veins and mark their position. Eventually you'll get red/black granite surface stones to craft a level 3 pickaxe.
